title: Hipster Summer Reading List

prelude.value: It’s officially summer and you’re looking for your next read. But you don’t want to read what everyone else is reading. No, you’ll take the books that no one is reading. Or even better, the books no one has touched in years.
These stories haven’t been checked out from the Seattle Public Library in at least 15 years. Sounds like they’re just your speed.

minimapHed: There are 306 books in this stack
